title: AgentNameResolutionItem (ANRI)
description: Schema for an Agent Name Resolution Item, as returned by ANS in list mode for ACNBP. Contains the agent's ANS name and pointers to essential metadata.

ansName.description: The full ANS name (URL) of the discovered agent (e.g., 'ans://TranslatorA_Corp.trustedcorp.com/dt').

protocolExtensionSummaryUrl.description: URL pointing to a summary of the agent's protocolExtension. This summary is used for initial filtering in CPS.

fullProtocolExtensionUrl.description: URL pointing to the agent's complete protocolExtension document for detailed fetching.

certificateReferenceUrl.description: URL pointing to the agent's digital certificate or information about its PKI.

lastModified.description: Optional: Timestamp indicating when this ANRI or its referenced metadata was last updated in ANS.

ansRecordSignature.description: Optional: A digital signature from ANS over the ANRI content to ensure its integrity from the source.
